item.title: Marine Le Pen Falls to the Rule of Law and a Great Battle Looms
item.description: A court’s conviction of the far-right leader for embezzlement and its ban on her running for office have set off a new crisis for France.

item.title: Investigating a Sprawling Money Laundering Network
item.description: Two New York Times reporters spent several months learning the intricacies of a wide-reaching web of scammers.
